messages.title: Another hung parliament, or a majority Conservative government.
Vote this Thursday for:
content: A strong economy with more jobs and lower taxes.
Billions extra for our NHS, schools, and police.
Action to protect our environment and York's green belt.

messages.title: How to use your vote to get a majority government
content: 1. A Conservative-Lib Dem coalition isn't an option. So a vote for the Lib Dems means another hung parliament.
2. Vote Lib Dem, get Corbyn and Sturgeon. Nicola Sturgeon ready to make Jeremy Corbyn the next Prime Minister if there is a hung Parliament
3. Vote Conservative to get stuff done. The Conservatives can win a majority.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Billions extra for our NHS, schools, and police.
Action to protect our environment and York's green belt.

otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Nicola Sturgeon ready to make Jeremy Corbyn the next Prime Minister if there is a hung Parliament
Vote Lib Dem, get Corbyn and Sturgeon
mentions.partyLeader: The Conservatives can win a majority. That means with your vote, we can get on with our country’s priorities.
tacticalSituation: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
